articles.title: 7 reasons your stomach hurts after eating food - Times of India
articles.description: If your stomach ache goes away on its own after a while, it is generally due to the food. In case it is accompanied by other symptoms then it can be due to some underlying medical conditions.
articles.content: Eating food you are allergic to can irritate the stomach lining and may cause pain. It can be caused due to different foods, but the common ones are gluten, wheat, and lactose.
